messages.subject: Info please
messages.msgSnippet: Someone posted something in just the last day or so about an addy in regard to watching violence on TV or in vidoe games or something. I wanted to save it and
messages.messageBody:
Someone posted something in just the last day or so about an addy in regard
to watching violence on TV or in vidoe games or something. I wanted to save
it and go back and read it and well.....you know how that goes. I don't
remember what the subject even was and was wondering if instead of archiving
to look, someone can't post it again.

Thanks,
Mary B
